programme.title: Steve's Outdoor Adventures TV
programme.sub-title: Alberta Black Bear Hunt, Part One
programme.desc: Steve West returns to his birth state to hunt for aoudad sheep in the Davis Mountains of Texas.

programme.title: Hoge Wild
programme.desc: Lucas heads to Lanai, Hawaii for some big game hunting.

programme.title: Realtree Outdoors
programme.desc: Cole Barthel hunts his lease with friends in Oklahoma.

programme.title: Roger Raglin Outdoors
programme.desc: The Raglin's shoot hogs and whitetail deer in Texas and Roger shoots a trophy Nilgai bull on the trip.

programme.title: The Obsession of Carter Andrews
programme.desc: Carter reunites with friends Tyler Nonn and Scott Crippen for a new experience on the Chesapeake Bay.

programme.title: Trev Gowdy's Monster Fish
programme.desc: MAMMOTH STURGEON in British Columbia, HUGE STRIPED BASS on the beaches of New England, GIANT LARGEMOUTH in the lakes of Texas, and THOUSAND POUND TUNA off Prince Edward Island. Countdown to the biggest Monster fish.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons
programme.desc: We go to the mail room for viewer requests as Terry and Larry take a look into famous scenes from Yellowstone, SWAT, Fast and Furious.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons
programme.desc: Terry and Larry test things they never got to from other episodes. Pull up a chair and get ready for leftovers, and a surprise guest!

programme.title: Survival Science
programme.desc: In addition to marksmanship and long range shooting, military snipers are trained in a variety of skills: detection, stalking, camouflage, infiltration, special reconnaissance and target acquisition. Bottom line, there’s a ton of cool shooting and science for Nick and Laura to explore!

programme.title: Fight To Survive
programme.desc: A father and son camping trip turns into a desperate fight to survive when John Sloot is crushed under an ATV. Now his 10 year-old son, Cody must brave the wilderness alone to get help.

programme.title: Life on the Edge
programme.desc: The Summervilles' wildfowl hunting season is in full swing, with brant geese gracing the trophy shelf and the dinner table. On the island of Umnak, ranchers Pat and Connie Harvie and engineer Donovan perfect their volcano escape plan and Kodiak fishing guide, Nick Blanco shows two VIPs round his cabin build.

programme.title: Jim Shockey's UNCHARTED
programme.desc: Still in Russia, Jim tests his patience and persistence while hunting Amur Brown bears on one of the longest hunts on stand of his career.
